00040 require_once($MODEL_PATH.'model.php');
00041 
00042 class Imspector extends Model
00043 {
00044     public $Name= 'imspector';
00045     public $User= '_imspector';
00046     
00047     public $ConfFile= '/etc/imspector/imspector.conf';
00048     public $LogFile= '/var/log/imspector.log';
00049     
00050     private $badwordsFile= '/etc/imspector/badwords.txt';
00051     private $aclFile= '/etc/imspector/acl.txt';
00052 
00053     public $PidFile= '/var/run/imspector.pid';
00054     
00055     function Imspector()
00056     {
00057         global $TmpFile;
00058         
00059         parent::Model();
00060         
00061         $this->StartCmd= "/usr/local/sbin/imspector -c $this->ConfFile > $TmpFile 2>&1 &";
00062 
00063         $this->Commands= array_merge(
00064             $this->Commands,
00065             array(
00066                 'GetBadwords'=> array(
00067                     'argv'  =>  array(),
00068                     'desc'  =>  _('Get badwords'),
00069                     ),
00070 
00071                 'AddBadword'=>  array(
00072                     'argv'  =>  array(STR),
00073                     'desc'  =>  _('Add badword'),
00074                     ),
00075 
00076                 'DelBadword'=>  array(
00077                     'argv'  =>  array(STR),
00078                     'desc'  =>  _('Delete badword'),
00079                     ),
00080 
00081                 'GetAcl'=>  array(
00082                     'argv'  =>  array(),
00083                     'desc'  =>  _('Get ACL'),
00084                     ),
00085 
00086                 'AddAcl'=>  array(
00087                     'argv'  =>  array(STR),
00088                     'desc'  =>  _('Add ACL'),
00089                     ),
00090 
00091                 'DelAcl'=>  array(
00092                     'argv'  =>  array(STR),
00093                     'desc'  =>  _('Delete ACL'),
00094                     ),
00095 
00096                 'MoveAclUp'=>   array(
00097                     'argv'  =>  array(STR),
00098                     'desc'  =>  _('Move ACL Up'),
00099                     ),
00100 
00101                 'MoveAclDown'=> array(
00102                     'argv'  =>  array(STR),
00103                     'desc'  =>  _('Move ACL Down'),
00104                     ),
00105                 )
00106             );
00107     }
00108 
00109     function GetVersion()
00110     {
00111         return 'IMSpector 0.9';
00112     }
00113 
00114     function SetConfig($confname)
00115     {
00116         global $basicConfig, $badwordsConfig, $aclConfig;
00117 
00118         $this->Config= ${$confname};
00119     }
00120 
00121     function GetBadwords()
00122     {
00123         return $this->GetFile($this->badwordsFile);
00124     }
00125 
00126     function AddBadword($badword)
00127     {
00128         $this->DelBadword($badword);
00129         return $this->AppendToFile($this->badwordsFile, $badword);
00130     }
00131 
00132     function DelBadword($badword)
00133     {
00134         $badword= Escape($badword, '/.');
00135         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->badwordsFile, "/^($badword\s)/m", '');
00136     }
00137 
00138     function GetAcl()
00139     {
00140         return $this->SearchFileAll($this->aclFile, "/^\h*((allow|deny)\h+[^\n]+)$/m", 1);
00141     }
00142 
00143     function AddAcl($acl)
00144     {
00145         $this->DelAcl($acl);
00146         return $this->AppendToFile($this->aclFile, $acl);
00147     }
00148 
00149     function DelAcl($acl)
00150     {
00151         $acl= Escape($acl, '/.');
00152         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->aclFile, "/^($acl\n)/m", '');
00153     }
00154 
00155     function MoveAclUp($acl)
00156     {
00157         $acl= Escape($acl, '/.');
00158         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->aclFile, "/^\h*((allow|deny)\h+[^\n]+)\n+\h*($acl)\n/m", '${3}'."\n".'${1}'."\n");
00159     }
00160 
00161     function MoveAclDown($acl)
00162     {
00163         $acl= Escape($acl, '/.');
00164         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->aclFile, "/^\h*($acl)\n+\h*((allow|deny)\h+[^\n]+)\n/m", '${2}'."\n".'${1}'."\n");
00165     }
00166 }
